DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether C-Reactive Protein ( CRP ) elevate patient active migraine headache . Secondary goal determine whether inflammatory marker , Calcitonin Gene Peptide ( CGRP ) , Vasoactive Intestinal Polypeptide ( VIP ) Substance P ( SP ) elevate patient migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: Inflammatory Markers Patients With Active Migraine Headaches
DOC.detailed_description: A random selection patient male female primary care practice diagnosis migraine headache enrol . Thirty ( 30 ) patient recruit mainly primary care practice . Recruitment include male female age 21-65 . The patient meet inclusion criterion enrol . The patient migraine headache also enrol function control . Non-migraine patient meet inclusion criterion 1 , 2 3 exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must sign write informed consent . 2 . Enrollment population would include male females 21 year age 65 year age . 3 . Nonmigraine subject allow control group 4 . Have episodic migraine headache 5 . Patients satisfy diagnosis migraine headache aura , without aura mixed . 6 . Must able differentiate migraine headache headaches 1 . Any medical condition opinion investigator would make subject unsuitable enrollment . 2 . Basilar hemiplegic migraine headache . 3 . Pregnant woman nurse mother 4 . History ( within 1 year ) current evidence drug alcohol abuse . 5 . More 15 migraine headache per month 6 . Chronic daily headache 7 . Chronic use NSAIDs 8 . Current participation research study within last 30 day .
